|area_code = 305, 786, 645 |blank_name = FIPS code |blank_info = 12-33425 |blank1_name = |blank1_info = |footnotes = |website = }} Indian Creek is a wealthy village in Miami-Dade County, Florida, United States. The population was 84 at the 2020 census. It was the 5th highest-income place in Florida. It is near Miami. ==References== Category:Villages in Florida
